entry.title: So smile!
entry.summary:
Author: crying_outlad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,633Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 710

Summary: You'd always heard the phrase "be careful what you wish for", but you had never paid it any mind. And though growing up you had wished, prayed even, for your family's attention, the yearning had slowed down considerably, enough for you to choose to move out from the hell that had become your life.But just before you can leave the old, creaky manor, your wishes finally come true. And it's only after that you learn to appreciate what you had, awful as it was. But maybe, just maybe, you can escape your suffocating family.------------------Yandere! Batfam x Neglected Male! Reader.My Tumblr is the basically same as my AO3 @ lol.@crying-outlad if you're interested. This is the only post there so far anyway.

entry.title: The Black Widow of Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: TheMostUniqueName20

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,002Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 52

Summary: When y/n was 11 years old, she was enrolled at Gotham Academy under a false identity, placed by her Red Room handlers as a part of an early infiltration assignment. "Find out more about the Wayne family, get close to them, and take them out." But what happens when you get too close to the supposed enemy? What happens when you form genuine connections? What happens when you feel like a kid again? Forgetting you're supposed to hurt the Waynes, not be one? Well, the Red Room will step in and cut you out and start your training from scratch again, all while leaving those who now have a connection with you wondering where you are, where it went wrong, if you're okay.... Eventually, they accept your disappearance until you've eventually become a faded memory to them. ¬† Until... 8 years later..... ¬† (Use of y/n for right now will be replaced with "___", sorry for bad summary üòÖ)ONLY ON A03

entry.title: desire, i'm hungry
entry.summary:
Author: yourstrulykoios

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,510Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: ‚ÄúSo what do you want then, kid?‚Äù He moves his hand away from the gaping tear in your flesh, resting a warm palm at the base of your spine. It was anything but comforting, his other hand still gripping onto your nape like a branding iron, his touch burning into your flesh and keeping you shoved down into the mattress. Something ugly reared up in your chest, something so hungry you hardly recognized it as you. ‚ÄúTo eat.‚Äù Your voice was muffled in the blanket, saliva pooling between your incisors and canines. He laughed at you, deep and mean. It ignites your skin, sends a wild flurry of goosebumps up your arms, and you don‚Äôt answer properly, you don‚Äôt even try. Because with a sinking feeling in your gut, you realize that he could strike you against your cheek right here, right now, and you would kneel at his feet and say thank you.

entry.summary:
Author: River_Shayde

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,410Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Ever wonder what would happen if Dick had to raise Jason, Tim, and Damian during the 1960s in Gotham? What if they all met a once privileged girl who lost everything and now has to acclimate life in the greaser side of town? How will they all interact and face the villains, socs, and family issues that make up their daily life?Reader turns 18 a few days after meeting the family, and this will mainly be a Jason and Tim love story.
